name: The Unspecified Number of Ravens
description:
This short adventure game is based on the The Seven Ravens story developed as part of coursework. Interact with NPCs in town to collect items to save your brothers from the witch.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Progress Dialogue: Space

Dialogue Choices: Q or E

Hide/Display HUD: F

Made By

  • Nivesh Modi (https://lochmessmonster.itch.io/)
  • TheDieHardNinja (https://itch.io/profile/thediehardninja)
